items.title: Rename and copy a room
items.description: Added possibility to rename or to copy a board.
items.author: xlrb

items.title: JIRA card
items.description: Added a new card type: the JIRA card. This card allow to easily write efforts on the card.
items.author: xlrb

items.title: Context menu
items.description: Added a context menu to directly add on a card on the board or to change the card type.
items.author: xlrb

items.title: Help and History modules
items.description: Added a documentation to use ptv-logistics scrumblr + versioning module
items.author: xlrb

items.title: Resizable columns
items.description: Added the possibility to resize independently each column of the board
items.author: xlrb

items.title: Undo deletion
items.description: Added the possibility to undo the deletion of the cards selection via the 'ctrl+z' keys.
items.author: xlrb

items.title: Multi-selection
items.description: Added the possibility to select several cards at the same time. Multi-selection can be moved, copied and pasted or deleted.
items.author: xlrb
